metadata.title: Manoel Gustavo - Full Stack Developer
metadata.description: Portfolio of Manoel Gustavo, a Full Stack Developer with experience in modern web technologies.

home.description: Full Stack Software Engineer with 4+ years of experience delivering high-performance systems for fintechs. I thrive in agile, collaborative teams, leading backend architecture, optimizing cloud infrastructure, integrating with external partners to drive strategic product impact and building intuitive front-ends that drive real value and user satisfaction.
